thread.title: Why I Hate The Term 'Broken Home'

title: Why I Hate The Term 'Broken Home'
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Parents - Today 
I hate the term "broken home," meaning a family where the parents are divorced. I grew up in the generation of divorce. I can remember child...
